TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CustomErrorsMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the values for the custom errors modality.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The CustomErrorsMode enumerates the values you can use when setting the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.Mode%2A> property. These values define whether custom errors are enabled, disabled, or shown only to remote clients.
## Examples The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.Mode%2A> property.
[!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#9](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.web.configurati_54_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#9](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.web.configurati_54_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsMode Off = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Disables custom errors, allowing display of standard errors.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsMode On = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Enables custom errors. If no <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect%2A> is specified, standard errors are issued.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsMode RemoteOnly = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Enables custom errors on remote clients only. Custom errors are shown only to remote clients and ASP.NET errors are shown to the local host.
